I can safely say it wasn't the DOT bug..I've *never* experienced that bug
while not grouped, and when I did experience it in the group, it was always
in a group with a 2nd necromancer (I think that the mob would die in one
tick from 2 different dot's from 2 different casters, thus not knowing who
to credit with the kill, so it just plain disappears) I did hit the guy
late with the DOT's but he was practically at full health. Also, screaming
terror was fixed to not work properly outdoors...which Qeynos Hills
definitely is. Yet another bug :) mobs can use it outside but we can't?
C'mon! The combination of xp/corpse loss on both the enchanter by the lake
and Undying Varsoon, I'm 90% sure that this bug is caused by pets becoming
mobs for all intents and purposes. Whatever it is, I really hope they fix
it soon, because I'm not leaving Qeynos Hills until I have that stone.
Though killing guards, poachers, rangers and druids is great xp, I'd like to
move on to something with a bit better loot than bronze weapons ;)
